projects.title: Res-Q App
projects.description: ResQ Connect is a mobile application designed to connect agencies and NGOs to help people in dire need who are struck by calamity and disaster. Built with Flutter, ResQ Connect offers a seamless and efficient way to coordinate relief efforts and provide assistance quickly and effectively.

projects.title: Snippify
projects.description: An Snippet Website for for React and Flutter components made in Nextjs.

experiences.description: Creating Zariya AI , a platform for blue collar workers and employers to collaborate and make the hiring of workers easy
Built responsive websites and collaborated with design teams for seamless UI integration.
Assisted in wireframing and prototyping digital products for client projects.
